data.eml:eml: A revision of the genus Sierraphytoptus Keifer 1939 (Eriophyoidea, Phytoptidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Chetverikov, Philipp E., Sukhareva, Sogdiana I. (2009): A revision of the genus Sierraphytoptus Keifer 1939 (Eriophyoidea, Phytoptidae). Zootaxa 2309: 30-42, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.191845
